mapper.select:
WITH PROCNAME AS ( SELECT 'NEWONLINE01' AS SERVER FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'NEWONLINE02' AS SERVER FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'NEWONLINE03' AS SERVER FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'NEWONLINE04' AS SERVER FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'NEWONLINE05' AS SERVER FROM DUAL )
SELECT A.SERVER FROM PROCNAME A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING(MERCHANTPROCNAME, 1, 10) AS SERVER, COUNT(*) FROM VANON.TBLTLF${strToday} WHERE UNIQUENO BETWEEN '${stUNIQUENO}' AND '${endUNIQUENO}' AND INS_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE('${stIND_DT}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE('${endIND_DT}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND MERCHANTPROCNAME LIKE 'V_TERMSVR%' GROUP BY SUBSTRING(MERCHANTPROCNAME, 1, 10)
UNION ALL
SELECT MERCHANTPROCNAME AS SERVER, COUNT(*) FROM VANON.TBLTLF${strToday} WHERE UNIQUENO BETWEEN '${stUNIQUENO}' AND '${endUNIQUENO}' AND INS_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE('${stIND_DT}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE('${endIND_DT}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND MERCHANTPROCNAME LIKE 'NEWONLINE%' GROUP BY MERCHANTPROCNAME ) B ON A.SERVER = B.SERVER WHERE B.SERVER IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM VANON.TBLTLF${nextDay}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM VANON.TBLICTLF${nextDay}
